content.prompt: The Chesapeake Bay is a watershed that is located in six states and the District of Columbia. Which of the following can cause an increase in water pollution in the watershed?

choices.label: An increase in the number of grasses, trees, and shrubs near a watershed
An increase in the natural systems near a watershed
An increase in stormwater runoff in urban areas
A decrease in the number of impervious surfaces near the watershed

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain environmental concepts, processes, or models in applied contexts.
